quote.quotepara: On Tue, 21 Jun 2011 16:36:38 -0500 Larry Finger<Larry.Finger@lwfinger.net> wrote:

This patch sent me looking to find the public source for this routine. After finding it in the source section of Broadcom-wl, I noticed there is some additional code that is not implemented in the ssb version. Should this additional material be implemented, or is it not applicable?

could you quote that function here? That would be way easier to get what were
talking about.

body.para: The file in question is found from the Broadcom wl driver. When you untar it into directory "broadcom", the file is broadcom/src/shared/siutils.c.

My initial conclusion that the clock_rate routine from the above file and drivers/ssb/main.c were different was wrong. When I checked them again, they do exactly the same thing after this patch is applied. Sorry for the noise.
